data.title: Standard Defender Wall for A Site and B Site
data.description: Use this simple, yet effective wall to cover the chokepoints of both A Site and B Site.

data.title: A Site Ramp to B Site Toxic Screen
data.description: A good toxic screen to defend both entrances to A and also defend the entrance to B while only physically being on one site.

data.title: C Site to B Site Toxic Screen
data.description: A good toxic screen to defend both C Site and B Site while physically being on one site.

data.title: C Site To C Long One Way Smoke
data.description: This one way smoke is great for holding the C Long angle and makes it impossible for the enemies to contest you.
